messages.content:
You are tasked with adding English translations to a set of stakeholder quotes. For each quote:
- If the quote is in English, add "N.A." as the translation
- If the quote is in any other language, provide an accurate English translation

Input format is a markdown table with stakeholder names and quotes.
Output should be a markdown table with three columns: name, original quote, and translation.

IMPORTANT RULES:
- Never translate English quotes to English - use "N.A." instead.
- Only and always translate non-English quotes.
- If the original quote, in the third column of the md table is not in english, translate it and add the translation in the 4th column, as described below, but that is only when the quote is not in English.
- Keep original quotes exactly as they are.
- Maintain the markdown table format, without including any horizontal divider lines

Example input:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." |

Example output:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." | "This decision is important." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." | N.A. |

Example input:
| [Person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,eyc..)] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] |

Example output:
| [person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,etc..)] | [Translated Quote] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] | N.A. |

If the input is "None", return "None". if the original quote is not in English, make sure it is translated. Add "N.A" if the quote is already in English.

Input quotes:
| Andrew "Twiggy" Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "Fortescue has pushed back against allegations it had 'unclean hands' after spying on former staff." |
| Michael Masterman | Chief Executive of Element Zero | "The allegations are spurious." |
| Chris McMeniman | Barrister for Element Zero | "The level of surveillance conducted on the respondents was highly invasive and not necessary." |
| David Studdy SC | Barrister representing Element Zero and its directors | "The only collateral purpose ... is the extraordinary conduct of Fortescue which is now understandably causing it some concern and wanting to shut all of this down." |
| Julian Cooke SC | Barrister for Fortescue | "I mean my goodness, the submissions by the respondents in relation to this are just so far-fetched. It really defies logic." |
| Dr Bartlomiej Kolodziejczyk | Director of Element Zero | "We’re not trying to have our cake and eat it." |

| Andrew "Twiggy" Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "Fortescue has pushed back against allegations it had 'unclean hands' after spying on former staff." | N.A. |
| Michael Masterman | Chief Executive of Element Zero | "The allegations are spurious." | N.A. |
| Chris McMeniman | Barrister for Element Zero | "The level of surveillance conducted on the respondents was highly invasive and not necessary." | N.A. |
| David Studdy SC | Barrister representing Element Zero and its directors | "The only collateral purpose ... is the extraordinary conduct of Fortescue which is now understandably causing it some concern and wanting to shut all of this down." | N.A. |
| Julian Cooke SC | Barrister for Fortescue | "I mean my goodness, the submissions by the respondents in relation to this are just so far-fetched. It really defies logic." | N.A. |
| Dr Bartlomiej Kolodziejczyk | Director of Element Zero | "We’re not trying to have our cake and eat it." | N.A. |
